titles.title: Recognizing and congratulating Apolo Anton Ohno for his historic performances in short track speed skating at the 2002, 2006, and 2010 Olympic Winter Games and congratulating him for winning more Olympic Winter Games medals than any other American athlete.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

bill.summary: 3/9/2010--Introduced. Recognizes Apolo Anton Ohno for: (1) his historic performances in short track speed skating at the 2002, 2006, and 2010 Olympic Winter Games; and (2) winning more Olympic Winter Games medals than any other American athlete.
